-Just ain't right. -No, it's not.
translation.es: Es que no está bien. No, no está bien.

translation.en: -Where are you going? -I quit.
-Rudy, wait up. -The hell with Devine, hell with Yonto!
Wait up. In two years, you haven't missed one practice.
translation.es: Oye, espera. En dos añosno has faltado ni una vez.

translation.en: The last one of senior year, you quit?
-That's what I said. I quit. -I don't want you to quit.
What the hell is it to you?
Rudy, you're one of the reasons I stayed on this last year.
translation.es: Tú eres la razón porla que me quedé este año.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry.
You're sorry?
You're full of crap, you know that?
Everything you did and everything you said is bullshit!
translation.es: ¡Todo lo que decías y todolo que defendías, era mentira!

translation.en: Tell Jake to make sure the tarp's ready.
We'll check with the weather service by 5, and we'll make a decision then.
translation.es: A las 5:00 llamamos al ServicioMeteorológico y decidimos.

translation.en: What you doing here? Don't you have practice?
Not anymore. I quit.
Well, since when are you the quitting kind?
I just don't see the point anymore.
translation.es: Ya no le veo la razón.

translation.en: So you didn't make the dress list.
translation.es: No te vas a poder ponerel uniforme, ¿y qué?

translation.en: There are greater tragedies in the world.
I wanted to run out of that tunnel for my dad.
translation.es: Yo quería salir por ese túnel,por mi papá.

translation.en: -To prove to everyone-- -Prove what?
-That I was somebody. -Oh, you are so full of crap.
You're 5 feet nothing. A hundred and nothing.
translation.es: Apenas mides el metro cincuenta.Apenas pesas los 50 kgs.

translation.en: And you've got hardly a speck of athletic ability.
You hung in with the best college football team in the land for two years.
translation.es: ¡Y llevas dos años con el mejorequipo universitario!

translation.en: And you're also gonna walk out of here... ...with a degree from the University of Notre Dame.
translation.es: Además, vas a salir de aquí conun título de la Univ. de Notre Dame.

translation.en: In this lifetime, you don't have to prove nothing to nobody except yourself.
translation.es: En esta vida no le tienes queprobar nada a nadie, más que a ti.

translation.en: And after what you've gone through, if you haven't done that by now...
translation.es: Y si después de todo lo quehas pasado, no lo has logrado...

translation.en: ...it ain't gonna never happen.
Now go on back.
Sorry I never got you to see your first game in here.
translation.es: Discúlpame si no te traje a verningún partido.

translation.en: Hell, I've seen too many games in this stadium.
translation.es: He visto demasiados partidosen este estadio.

translation.en: -You said you never saw a game. -I've never seen one from the stands.
translation.es: Pero tú dijiste... No he visto ninguno desde las gradas.

translation.en: You were a player?
I rode the bench for two years.
translation.es: Estuve en la banca dos años.

translation.en: Thought I wasn't being played because of my color.
translation.es: Pensé que estaba en la bancapor mi color.

translation.en: I got filled up with a lot of attitude, so I quit.
Still not a week goes by, I don't regret it.
translation.es: No ha pasado ni una semanaque no me arrepienta.

translation.en: And I guarantee a week won't go by in your life...
translation.es: Y te garantizo que no pasaráni una semana...

translation.en: ...you won't regret walking out, letting them get the best of you.
translation.es: Y te garantizo que no pasaráni una semana... ...que tú no te arrepientas.

translation.en: Now, you hear me clear enough?
Yeah.
Bill? The pitch was too soon, son. Quick, make him commit.
translation.es: ¿Bill? Se la echaste demasiadopronto. Espera. Deja que se decida.

translation.en: Thirty-eight option, 38 option.
Let's hustle up.
It's Rudy.
Welcome back. Line up.
What the hell's going on down there? Let's get back to work.
Yeah?
Oh, hi, Roland. Come in.
I want Rudy to dress in my place, coach.
translation.es: Quiero que Rudyalinee en mi lugar.

translation.en: He deserves it.
Don't be ridiculous.
Georgia Tech is one of the top offensive teams in the country.
translation.es: Georgia Tech es unode los mejores equipos del país.

translation.en: You're an all-American and our captain. Act like it.
translation.es: Tú eres seleccionado nacionaly capitán. Actúa como tal.

translation.en: I believe I am.
Me too, coach.
I want Rudy to dress in my place.
translation.es: Quiero que Rudy alineeen mi lugar.

translation.en: Coach, this is for Rudy.
For Rudy, coach.
I promise. This is the real thing.
translation.es: Te prometo que es en serio.

translation.en: I'm gonna be on the sidelines, in uniform.
translation.es: Voy a estar en la banca, de uniforme.

translation.en: Frank, I've never asked you for anything in my life.
translation.es: Frank, jamás en mi vidate he pedido nada.

translation.en: Promise me he'll be on that bus tomorrow.
translation.es: Pero prométeme que mañanatomará el autobús.

translation.en: Frank, I want you to be there too.
translation.es: Frank, quiero que tú tambiénestés aquí.

translation.en: Please.
-Here you go. -What a day for a game, huh, coach?
translation.es: Ya llegamos. Qué día para un juego,¿no, entrenador?

translation.en: -All right. Go Irish! -Go Irish!
-Thank you. -Thank you.
I'll get you on the way back. I don't got my wallet on me.
translation.es: Al rato te pago.No traigo aquí mi cartera.

translation.en: This is our gate.
Hey, Rudy?
I just want you to know that I think this is a great thing.
Thanks.
You're welcome.
It's your day.
-I wish you could be out there with me. -I know.
translation.es: -Me gustaría que pudieras jugar.-Ya lo sé.

translation.en: This is the most beautiful sight these eyes have ever seen.
translation.es: Esta es la vista más hermosaque he visto en mi vida.

translation.en: Come on, Dad.
Huddle up.
Bring it in, guys.
Father.
Everyone, take a hand.
Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee.
translation.es: Dios te salve, María,llena eres de gracia.

translation.en: Blessed art thou among women... ...and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
translation.es: Bendita entre las mujeres.Bendito el fruto de tu vientre, Jesús.

translation.en: Holy Mary, mother of God...
...pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death. Amen.
translation.es: Santa María, ruegapor nosotros ahora... ...y en la hora de nuestra muerte.

translation.en: -Notre Dame, Our Mother. -Pray for us!
translation.es: Notre Dame, Madre Nuestra. ¡Ruega por nosotros!

translation.en: You all know what you have to do.
translation.es: Ya saben lo que tienen que hacer.

translation.en: Remember, no one...
...and I mean no one...
...comes into our house and pushes us around.
This is your game now, gentlemen.
And for you seniors, it's your last one, so make it count...
translation.es: Para los que se gradúan,esta es su despedida. Lúzcanse.

translation.en: ...because you will remember it for the rest of your lives.
translation.es: Van a recordar este juegoel resto de sus vidas.

translation.en: -Let's get them. -Yeah!
You ready, champ?
I've been ready for this my whole life.
translation.es: He estado listo toda mi vida.

translation.en: Then you take us out on the field.
translation.es: Entonces sal tú a la cabeza al campo.

translation.en: All right, let's go.
Here they go!
-That's him, 45. -Okay, 45. You see him?
Forty-five! Forty-five!
That's him! I know him! That's Rudy!
All right, you guys already know this...
...but this is the most important game of your lives.
No excuses. Do the work.
-Our Lady of Victory! -Pray for us!
What the hell? They're flying across the line.
Watch that number 70. He's waltzing with him.
translation.es: Fíjese en el 70.Está bailando con él.

translation.en: Forty yards for a Notre Dame touchdown.
translation.es: ¡40 yardas para la anotaciónde Notre Dame!

translation.en: Fourth quarter, with only three minutes to play... ...and the issue still in doubt.
translation.es: Estamos en el 4° cuarto, quedan3 minutos, cualquiera puede ganar.

translation.en: As Barrett fades back to pass... ...for Georgia Tech from his own 30-yard line.
translation.es: Barrat retrocede para pasarpor Georgia desde su yarda 30.

translation.en: Looks upfield and throws.
Intercepted by Roland Steele.
He has a convoy of blockers down the sidelines.
translation.es: Tiene un convoy de bloqueadoresen las líneas laterales.

translation.en: Steele going in unmolested... ...standing up, for a Notre Dame touchdown.
translation.es: Anota sin ser molestado.¡Anota, Notre Dame!

translation.en: It's a backbreaker for Georgia Tech.
-Joe, play all the seniors! -What about Rudy?
translation.es: ¡Joe! Mete a todoslos que se gradúan. ¿También a Rudy?

translation.en: -Come on. Let him in for one play. -Absolutely not.
translation.es: -Deje que esté en una jugada.-De ninguna manera.

translation.en: Coach, you gotta play him. You gotta play him, coach. Come on, coach. One play.
translation.es: Entrenador, tiene que dejarlojugar. Por favor. ¡Una jugada!

translation.en: Give him a chance, coach.
Notre Dame all over the ball. Thompson recovers for the Irish.
translation.es: Notre Dame se abalanza sobreel balón y lo recuperan.

translation.en: -Go Irish! -Rudy.
Rudy. Rudy.
Thirty-seven seconds remaining and it'll be all over here at Notre Dame.
translation.es: Quedan 37 segundosy esto se va a acabar.

translation.en: Off to our left...
...I'm starting to pick up the chant from the Notre Dame student body.
translation.es: ...oigo un canto del cuerpoestudiantil de Notre Dame.

translation.en: Can't quite make out just what it is at the moment.
In any event, Dan Devine's gonna empty his bench... ...with just little time remaining in the ball game.
translation.es: Devine vacía su bancacon poco tiempo en el reloj.

translation.en: One of the ballplayers going into the game is Jamie O'Hare.
translation.es: Uno de los jugadores que estáentrando al juego es Jamie O'Hare.

translation.en: You may recall that O'Hare was heavily recruited... ...throughout the country several years ago.
translation.es: A O'Hare lo trataron de reclutarescuelas de todo el país...

translation.en: He came to Notre Dame...
translation.es: ...hace varios años.Entró a Notre Dame y...

translation.en: ...and it's safe to say that his career has been a disappointment.
translation.es: ...podemos decir, sin errar, quesu carrera ha sido decepcionante.

translation.en: -Rudy! Rudy! Rudy! -Listen. They're chanting for Rudy.
Kill the clock. Do it and go into a "V."
Let's go. Listen up. Victory formation.
The hell with Devine, Billy.
Long as offense is out here Rudy can't play.
-We gotta run the play. -No, we gotta score now.
translation.es: -Tenemos que hacer la jugada.-Tenemos que anotar.

translation.en: -Come on. Let's get a score for Rudy. -Yeah, it's the last game.
All right, this one's yours. All right, pro right.
Thirty-eight halfback pass on one. On one. Ready?
translation.es: 38 pase al halfback a la una.A la una. ¿Listos?

translation.en: What the hell is he doing?
Thirty-five yards for the touchdown. Notre Dame, 23. Georgia Tech, 3.
That was for you.
What was that? Who called that play?
I tell you, it's just occurred to me...
...what the student body has been chanting the last two minutes.
It's the name "Rudy."
Dan Ruettiger, a walk-on senior...
translation.es: Dan Ruettiger, un alumnosin beca de fútbol sobre el cual...

translation.en: ...and subject of a feature article... ...in yesterday's student newspaper, The Observer.
translation.es: ...salió un artículo en el periódicoestudiantil El Observador.

translation.en: -After toiling for two years.... -All right, go get them, kid.
He's so little!
Come on. One more play.
What do I do?
Stay on. Stay there.
Yeah! Who's the wild man now!
-That's it. You were right. -Yes! Yes! Yes!
Since 1975 no other Notre Dame player...
translation.es: Desde 1975, ningún otrojugador de Notre Dame...

translation.en: ...has been carried off the field.
Daniel E. "Rudy" Ruettiger...
translation.es: Daniel E. "Rudy" Ruettigerse graduó... ...de Notre Dame en 1976.

translation.en: ...graduated from the University of Notre Dame in 1976.
Five of Rudy's younger brothers went on to college.
All received degrees.
translation.es: Cinco hermanos menoresde Rudy hicieron... ...carreras universitarias.
